technologies.name: Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Data
technologies.evidence: By leveraging deep tech innovation, AI-driven solutions, and precision vision technology, we streamline workflows, delivering unparalleled automated excellence and seamless operations.

technologies.name: Imaging Technology
technologies.evidence: AM-Flow provides automated quality control, AI-driven workflow optimization, and precision vision technology, integrating with existing systems for real-time data and tailored automation.

technologies.name: (Opto)Mechatronics
technologies.evidence: AM-Flow's identification and sorting capabilities have optimized our SLS and MJF processes, balancing density and geometry to reduce build costs.
